content: Add Inter + JetBrains Mono font imports to public/index.html
Inject Î©-Aurora design tokens and CSS custom properties into src/index.css
Install required dependencies: framer-motion, react-markdown, remark-gfm, react-tsparticles, tsparticles, emergentintegrations
Create src/components/brand/LogoOmega.jsx component with neural pathway SVG animation
Create src/components/layout/TopNav.jsx with sticky navigation and routes
Create src/lib/education-texts.js with provided education data
Create src/pages/Education.jsx with split layout, document/perspective toggles
Create src/pages/Demo.jsx with chat interface and markdown output panel
Update App.js with React Router for /education and /demo routes
Implement backend POST /api/generate endpoint with OpenAI integration
Test application with curl and screenshot_tool, fix any bugs
